column4: Can anyone help me with my problem ? Whenever my laptop goes into sleep mode, it never wakes up!!
many of these problems can't be solved due to hardware limitations. Do have a look at tuxmobil.org though, it lists installation reports for various laptop models among other things.
it's also worth having a look at /etc/default/acpi-support -- some of the suspend-related settings are in there with brief documentation
